Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Huron
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Chicago Ave, Cicero and Washington: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Huron.
